query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod
(
 tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,ifyyyymm
)
select 
    tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2;



delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
 where  ifyyyymm = '@{variables('yyyymm')}';

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history

	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,ifyyyymm
)

	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1

	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;
